title: First Trust Specialty Finance and Financial Opportunities Fund Declares Its Quarterly Distribution of $0.0825 Per Share - Yahoo Finance
content: First Trust Specialty Finance and Financial Opportunities Fund Declares Its Quarterly Distribution of $0.0825 Per Share  Yahoo Finance
description: WHEATON, Ill., May 10, 2022--First Trust Specialty Finance and Financial Opportunities Fund (the "Fund") (NYSE: FGB) has declared the Fund's regularly scheduled quarterly distribution of $0.0825 per share. The distribution will be payable on May 31, 2022, to shareholders of record as of May 23, 2022. The ex-dividend date is expected to be May 20, 2022. The quarterly distribution information for the Fund appears below.
